reviews.text: Just changed trains with disabled help after arriving from Felixstowe. Absolutely wonderful so kind and made it so easy. Thanks very much

Nice station, had loads of upgrades in the last year and a bit to improve the style and well being for the public, had a issue with a ticket once where I had to get a refund the price was £20 for the ticket and £10 for a refund IMO this is a little bit much as 50% of the ticket it self kid of shocked me. It has great little cafés and food areas with a WHSmith for standard day-to-day items. Other than the refund price this train station is well looked after, clean and respected.

Great station that has undergone significant improvements since Abellio took over however please please please can someone sort out the secured cycle racks. At best I reckon 20% usage compared to the ones in the car park that attract non cyclists..

This review relates to cycle parking at the station - there is 'advertised' secure cycle parking on platform 1, access to it is by a fobb system. However when I enquired at the ticket office, I was told it was 'already full' and there were 200 people on a waiting list. There is no secure cycle parking available for anyone simply turning up on the day. There is an unsecured undercover storage area covered by CCTV, if you're willing to risk it.
Very very repeatedly and regularly rude and dismissive unhelpful staff. Sure it's not the most exciting job but if you don't like it don't work there
